trans-unit.source: Handles the painting functionality for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects, applying a custom palette and a streamlined style.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 색상표와 효율적인 스타일을 적용하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 개체의 그리기 기능을 처리합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> creates pens and brushes based on a replaceable color table called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> 펜과 브러시 이라는 대체 가능한 색상표에 따라 만듭니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a composite control that mimics the **Navigation Pane** provided by Microsoft® Outlook®.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 모방 하는 복합 컨트롤을 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 **탐색 창** Microsoft® Outlook®에서 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Create a Professionally Styled ToolStrip Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-professionally-styled-toolstrip-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 전체 코드 목록을 참조 하십시오. [하는 방법: 전문적인 스타일의 ToolStrip 컨트롤 만들기](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-professionally-styled-toolstrip-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> class.
The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of a class derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서 파생 된 클래스의 인스턴스를 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는에 대해 제공 된 큰 예제의 일부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable" /> to be used for painting.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> class.
Gets the color palette used for painting.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable" /> used for painting.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripArrowRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderButtonBackground" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderDropDownButtonBackground" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Draws the item background.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemCheck" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemImage" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemTextRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemText" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderLabelBackground" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderMenuItemBackground" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderOverflowButtonBackground" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparatorRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderSeparator" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the OnRenderSplitButtonBackground event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBorder" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripContentPanelBackground" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 발생하면 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기가 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 또한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground%2A> 메서드를 사용하면 파생 클래스가 대리자를 연결하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이는 파생 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs)" />를 재정의하는 경우 등록된 대리자가 이벤트를 받도록 기본 클래스의 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> 메서드를 호출해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripPanelBackground" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 발생하면 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기가 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 또한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground%2A> 메서드를 사용하면 파생 클래스가 대리자를 연결하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이는 파생 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs)" />를 재정의하는 경우 등록된 대리자가 이벤트를 받도록 기본 클래스의 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> 메서드를 호출해야 합니다.

Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripStatusLabelBackground" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이는 파생 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripStatusLabelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripStatusLabelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripStatusLabelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs)" />를 재정의하는 경우 등록된 대리자가 이벤트를 받도록 기본 클래스의 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripStatusLabelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs)" /> 메서드를 호출해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether edges of controls have a rounded rather than a square or sharp appearance.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 가장자리를 사각형이나 날카로운 모양이 아니라 둥근 모양으로 표시할지를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to round off control edges; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 가장자리를 둥글게 처리하려면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.
